aboutAlternative.text: Graduate CS Student with a wide array of technical talents, aiming to develop optimized, innovative software to make an impact in solving real-world problems.

positions.title: Software Developer Intern
positions.description:
• Android OS and applications development for wearable mobile devices using Java, to optimize industrial workflow and increase time efficiency.
• Built and tested kernel development majorly in C language on Unix terminal.
• Followed Agile/Kanban software development framework and used JIRA for issue tracking.
• Git/repo used for syncing to master branch

positions.title: Student Assistant Developer
positions.description:
• Published 3 voice-enabled Alexa Skills to Amazon Skills store - Library FAQs resolver, Library book title and author voice search, and Events and library hours search using Alexa Skill Kit and AWS Lambda with Node.js and JSON interaction model and led the research for usage of NLU devices in library settings.
• Automated URL status/content checking and analysis of huge website datasets in Excel Spreadsheet using Excel VBA and Macros.
• Maintained the Altmetric widget implementation on host site.
• Linked PayPal payment of fines/fees using PayPal's PDT APIs on the library website.
• Designed pages for yearly revenue activities on the server.

positions.title: Software Engineer
positions.description:
• Worked as a part of Android For Work team by Google and KNOX container - Samsung's Mobile Security solution, developing and managing issues in Java and Android. Followed Agile software development framework and Scrum for product development.
• Supervised the smooth and fast running of Setup-Wizard for the creation of Managed P...

positions.title: Software Development Intern
positions.description:
• Developed a Platform-Independent PhoneGap Mobile Application for the catering of farm-grown items directly from NGOs ensuring the quality product and delivery.
• Redesigned current version of Cottage Industry Cart-App (Android based application) to be used on cross-platform mobile environments targeting iOS, Android as well as Windows....

positions.title: Cloud Developer Intern
positions.description: • Developed a module of Intelligent Survey System web application on Koding VM for deployment onto Cloud Platform (Amazon Web Services) using Elastic Beanstalk and supervised the running of web services using multi-threading instead of MVC, to increase parallel PHP request efficiency on Cloud by about 25%....

educations.title: Maulana Azad National Institute of Technology

given.text: She is smart engineer... within a small interval of time she learn most of the things and support AFW and Knox team brilliantly ... she is very good in concept of Java and technological areas I had a good exp with her in team ..

received.text:
Naveen Sir has always been an inspiring, highly knowledgable and dedicatedly driven team lead with all the best leadership qualities. He is a terrific mentor for anyone who has worked with him and is highly approachable for any queries. Working under his guidance in AFW team at Samsung was a great learning experience in terms of both professional growth and understanding of technical requirements for any job in the software industry.
